page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Iona.I am 10 years old.It is 1985.This is a typical day in my life.It was Saturday,one of the busiest days in the week.I got up,had a wash and cleaned my teeth and got dressed.Then I went downstairs to watch telly.My dad had taken the dog for a walk and my mum had washed her hair and she was drying it.My brother always stays in bed till about 10.30- 11.00 on Saturdays and we have to wake him up.Then I had some breakfast.I had a toasted teacake,it was really nice.Then I went to get David up but all he did was hide under the covers so mum had to get him up.He got dressed and came downstairs,by this time my dad had got back with the dog.We all got ready to go to town.It took mum ages to get ready so we missed the bus and had to wait for another.Once we got on the bus and
